text: Sara Loren (; born as Sarah Hussain), is a Pakistani actress and model. == Career == Loren made her film debut in the 2010 Pooja Bhatt's romantic thriller film Kajraare and later played as Nisha in the film Murder 3. That year she starred in Yasir Nawaz's Anjuman for which she won the Tarang Housefull Awardsâ€”Best Actress in a Leading Role. Loren acted in the stage performances of Anarkali, Shahyad Issi Ka Naam Mohabbat Hai Sheiftaa, in Karachi and Delhi. === Upcoming projects === As of 2015, Loren has completed filming for Anil Balani's Ishq Click. She is currently filming for Prakash Jha's Fraud Saiyyan with Arshad Warsi. == Filmography == Key Denotes the films that have not yet been released Year Title Role Language Notes 2004 Mahnoor Mahnoor Urdu Lollywood Debut 2004 Meharun Nisa Meharun Nisa Urdu/Hindi 2010 Kajraare Nargis Hindi Bollywood Debut 2011 Love Mein Ghum Herself Urdu Special appearance in song Love Mein Ghum 2013 Murder 3 Nisha Hindi 2013 Anjuman Anjum Hayat Khan Urdu 2014 Sultanat Herself Urdu Special appearance in song Saiyaan 2015 Barkhaa Barkhaa Hindi 2016 Ishq Click Sophie Dias Hindi Gidh TBA Urdu Delayed == Television == No. Show Role Channel Year 1\.
